sentences.en: He arrived with his customary promptness.
sentences.cn: 他像惯常那样准时到达.

sentences.en: Project management based on knowle dge management have showed new characters: information, flexibility, promptness.
sentences.cn: 融入知识管理后的工程项目管理呈现了新特点: 信息化 、 柔性化 、 敏捷化.

sentences.en: Promptness wins applause because it proves remarkable capacity: subtlety of judgement, prudence in action.
sentences.cn: 敏捷能赢得喝彩,因为这显示出一种天资卓绝的东西: 思想精微, 行动谨慎.

sentences.en: Promptness: All staff members to understand and follow empathy in discharging their duties without undue delay.
sentences.cn: 及时: 所有的银行职员应理解并遵循换位思考原则,在履行职责时不得无故拖延.

sentences.en: Service aim of Going Logistics: safety, promptness, Integrity, efficient.
sentences.cn: 贡盈物流服务宗旨: 安全 、 快捷 、 诚信 、 高效.

sentences.en: The manager replied with promptness and courtesy.
sentences.cn: 那经理思路敏捷、彬彬有礼地作了答复.

sentences.en: This method has the advantages of accuracy, promptness and convenience.
sentences.cn: 分析方法具有准确 、 快速、方便的优点.

sentences.en: This promptness proved how strictly he had held to his word.
sentences.cn: 这足以表示,他是多么谨守前约.

sentences.en: Track and follow - up on all special orders for accuracy, completeness, and promptness.
sentences.cn: 准确完整而又快速的追踪特殊订单.

words.tran_cn: 提示；付款期限；DOS命令：改变DOS系统提示符的风格
